attributes.description:
This Hilux has the power to rise to the challenge. With cabin comforts as standard and powerful engines that produce a surprisingly quiet ride, getting to where you need to be on time and conducting business on the move is easy. The Hilux isn’t simply a business tool; it’s also a smart business investment, that provides tough, capable and reliable performance.
 **Full service history ,Balance of service plan up to 90000km Backed by Automark** 
All trade ins welcome! 
In house finance arranged 
Standard warranty/service plans arranged
Peace of mind comes standard 
Dekra AA affiliated COR 
Kindly click the online enquiry form for a sales executive to contact you directly.

R-Line Alloy wheels with tyres that have more than 90% Tread on remaining.

Finance is available

Trade Ins most welcomed

Nationwide Delivery Possible.

attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient
